awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Ghosts of Mississippi is a drama covering the final trial of Byron De La Beckwith (Woods), the assassin of the 1960s civil rights leader Medgar Evers. It begins with the murder and the events surrounding the two initial trials which both ended in hung juries. The movie then covers District Attorney, Bobby De Laughter's (Baldwin) transformation and alliance with Myrlie Evers (Goldberg), the widow of Medgar Evers, as he becomes more involved with bringing Beckwith to trial for the third time 30 years later. Some of the characters are played by the actual participants in this story.
plot: The widow of murdered civil rights leader Medger Evers and a district attorney struggle to finally bring the murderer to justice.
title: Ghosts of Mississippi
